mapper.select: SELECT f.FREEBOARD_ID, f.USER_ID, f.FREEBOARD_TITLE, f.FREEBOARD_CONTENT, f.CREATED_AT, f.CREATED_BY, f.UPDATED_AT, f.UPDATED_BY, u.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_FREEBOARD f LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON f.USER_ID = u.USER_ID ORDER BY f.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT f.FREEBOARD_ID, f.USER_ID, f.FREEBOARD_TITLE, f.FREEBOARD_CONTENT, f.CREATED_AT, f.CREATED_BY, f.UPDATED_AT, f.UPDATED_BY, u.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_FREEBOARD f LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON f.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE f.FREEBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR f.FREEBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY f.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD WHERE FREEBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR FREEBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT f.FREEBOARD_ID, f.USER_ID, f.FREEBOARD_TITLE, f.FREEBOARD_CONTENT, f.CREATED_AT, f.CREATED_BY, f.UPDATED_AT, f.UPDATED_BY, u.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_FREEBOARD f LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON f.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE f.FREEBOARD_ID = #{freeboardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FREEBOARD ( USER_ID, FREEBOARD_TITLE, FREEBOARD_CONTENT, CREATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.FREEBOARD_COMMENT_ID, c.FREEBOARD_ID, c.USER_ID, c.FREEBOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, c.CREATED_AT, c.CREATED_BY, c.UPDATED_AT, c.UPDATED_BY, u.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_FREEBOARD_COMMENT c LEFT JOIN TB_USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE c.FREEBOARD_ID = #{freeboardId} ORDER BY c.CREATED_AT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FREEBOARD_COMMENT ( FREEBOARD_ID, USER_ID, FREEBOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{freeboardId}, #{userId}, #{freeboardCommentContent}, #{userId} )
